description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You command your squadmates to perform a devastating coordinated takedown. Signal up to three squadmates within the aura of your commander's banner who all have the same enemy within their reach; the squadmates can attempt to Strike, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] the opponent as a reaction. Each squadmate can only attempt one specific action granted by this tactic, the actions can be attempted in any order and a specific action can only be attempted once as part of this tactic.
